text: Fu Da-ren (; 3 April 1933 â€“ 7 June 2018) was a Taiwanese television presenter, sports author and activist. He received a Golden Bell Award in 1980. In later life, Fu was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer, and actively supported euthanasia. He decided not be euthanized and received a visit from Tsai Ing- wen upon his return to Taiwan. Fu underwent euthanasia on 7 June 2018 in Switzerland, aged 85. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Euthanasia activists Category:Deaths by euthanasia Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Taiwanese sportspeople Category:Taiwanese television presenters Category:Taiwanese writers Category:Taiwanese activists
title: Fu Da-ren
